2055330.name: Model Builder: Titan-Forge DLC no. 1
2055330.description:
Expand your collection of fantasy figurines with this new free DLC pack!

The Titan-Forge DLC no. 1 brings four new models to the base version of Model Builder, including:
  • Halfling Male Rogue
  • Half-Orc Female Barbarian
  • Human Female Paladin
  • Gnome Male Wizard

Every new model is connected to a new quest with a different task and new painting schemes to create! We are also introducing four new Steam Achievements to unlock with this DLC.

Get building, get creative!

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.
2055330.supported_languages:
英语*, 波兰语, 德语, 意大利语, 法语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 日语, 韩语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
